messages.content: Dear Voter, I am your Conservative candidate for the General Election and believe my local background to be key to fighting for the changes that we need in our area. [...] Many would suggest that leaving school with only one GCSE and as a teenage single mother would not be the best start to life. However, I sincerely hope that my story shows that individual hard work can achieve results irrespective of your background. [...] I want to be a driving force in society, a positive disruptive force sharing my story of change in individual lives to a national level.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Each time my team and I canvassed the local area during the days preceding the meetings, Added to this we have persuaded higher profile Conservative MPs to visit the area, meet with businesses people, shop owners and talk with members of the public.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am your Conservative candidate for the General Election and believe my local background to be key to fighting for the changes that we need in our area.

politicalExperience.duration: elected to the post in 2007 and then as a District Councillor in 2008
